verses.roman:
nija sṛṣṭi-śakti prabhu sañcāre pradhāne
īśvarera śaktye tabe haye ta' nirmāṇe

synonyms: nija—own; sṛṣṭi-śakti—power for creation; prabhu—the Lord; sañcāre—infuses; pradhāne—in the ingredients; īśvarera śaktye—by the power of the Lord; tabe—then; haye—there is; ta'-certainly; nirmāṇe—the beginning of creation.
translation: The Lord infuses the material ingredients with His own creative potency. Then, by the power of the Lord, creation takes place.
